page.title: 03Transport (continued)
page.content: {-Weybridge, Weybridge-Byfleet,Byfleet- {Woodham, Woodham-New Haw, New Haw- } {Addlestone.}The road we did the survey on was a main bus route and though we only stayed 15 minutes we saw 2{ {Geenline}buses! As well as the buses in the area several taxis and coach firms have their fleets firmly established in Byfleet and Weybridge.All in all there are 4 coach firms and 4 taxi firms working in the area.Also at{Brooklands {Airport}there is a{Heliport. { }The Railway cuts right through the area and is recognised as a direct link to London.The famous triangular junction near Byfleet changes Southern Region to Western Region and is classed as an extremely important junction.The railway itself uses modern technology and a recent survey shows that:-
